statements: SELECT * FROM points_earned
SELECT student_id, points FROM points_earned WHERE points > 10
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, points FROM points_earned ORDER BY student_id DESC, quiz_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, points FROM points_earned
SELECT COUNT(quiz_id) AS num_quizzes, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points_earned
SELECT * FROM points_earned WHERE student_id = 1 AND points > 10 ORDER BY quiz_id DESC
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points_earned GROUP BY student_id HAVING SUM(points) > 50
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM points_earned WHERE points <= 5
SELECT * FROM points_earned WHERE quiz_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND points BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT student_id, AVG(points) AS average_points FROM points_earned GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, points_earned FROM students INNER JOIN points ON students.student_id = points.student_id WHERE points_earned > 50;
SELECT points_earned, student_id FROM points WHERE quiz_id = 1 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT MAX(points_earned) AS max_points FROM points;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, points_earned FROM students JOIN points ON students.student_id = points.student_id WHERE points.points_earned > 80;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM points;
SELECT student_name, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM students JOIN points ON students.student_id = points.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM points_earned WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT id, points, quiz_id FROM points_earned WHERE challenge_id IS NULL;
SELECT full_name, age, date_enrolled FROM students WHERE grade_level = 'Grade 10';
SELECT quiz_name, total_points, difficulty_level FROM quizzes ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, timestamp_created FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard';
SELECT * FROM points_earned ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, full_name, email, age FROM students WHERE age > 15 AND grade_level = 'High School';
SELECT quiz_name, total_points, difficulty_level FROM quizzes WHERE total_points > 50 ORDER BY quiz_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, points, timestamp FROM points_earned JOIN students ON points_earned.student_id = students.student_id WHERE grade_level = 'Middle School' AND points > 20;
SELECT * FROM points_earned WHERE challenge_id IS NULL ORDER BY timestamp_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM points_table;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM points_table GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_category FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_name DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN points_table ON students.student_id = points_table.student_id
SELECT student_name, email, quiz_name, points_earned FROM students JOIN points_table ON students.student_id = points_table.student_id JOIN quizzes ON points_table.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, points_earned FROM students JOIN points_table ON students.student_id = points_table.student_id JOIN quizzes ON points_table.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE points_earned > 80

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, quiz_category, points_earned FROM students JOIN points_table ON students.student_id = points_table.student_id JOIN quizzes ON points_table.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE quiz_category = 'Math'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM points_table
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT quiz_name, category, date_created FROM Quizzes ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE dob <= '2000-01-01';
SELECT challenge_id, student_id, points FROM Challenges WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY points ASC;
SELECT quiz_name, category, date_created FROM Quizzes WHERE category = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM QuizScores WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE dob > '2000-01-01';
SELECT quiz_name, category FROM Quizzes WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT challenge_id, points, timestamp FROM Challenges ORDER BY points DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_completed_challenges FROM ChallengesCompleted WHERE status = 'completed' GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_completed_challenges > 5;
